cast.overview: Rome, 1957. A woman, Cabiria, is robbed and left to drown by her boyfriend, Giorgio. Rescued, she resumes her life and tries her best to find happiness in a cynical world. Even when she thinks her struggles are over and she has found happiness and contentment, things may not be what they seem.
cast.title: Nights of Cabiria

details.biography:
Amedeo Nazzari (Cagliari, 10 December 1907 – 6 November 1979) was an Italian actor. Nazzari was one of the leading figures of Italian classic cinema, often considered a local variant of the Australian-American star Errol Flynn.

Description above from the Wikipedia Amedeo Nazzari licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Amedeo Nazzari
